[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@verseengine/verse-three-ui](./verse-three-ui.md) &gt; [GuiHandlers](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.md)

## GuiHandlers interface

Data input/output interface common to Gui2D and Gui3D.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface GuiHandlers 
```

## Example

Mock

```js
      function createMockGuiHandlers() {
        let isMicOn = false;
        let bgmVolume = 0;
        let voiceVolume = 0;
        let isMirrorOn = false;
        const listeners = [];
        const onModified = () => listeners.forEach((f) => f());
        return {
          addModifiedListener: (f) => {
            listeners.push(f);
          },
          isMicOn: () => isMicOn,
          micOff: async () => {
            isMicOn = false;
            onModified();
          },
          micOn: async () => {
            isMicOn = true;
            onModified();
          },
          getBgmVolume: () => bgmVolume,
          setBgmVolume: async (v) => (bgmVolume = v),
          getVoiceVolume: () => voiceVolume,
          setVoiceVolume: async (v) => (voiceVolume = v),
          isMirrorOn: () => isMirrorOn,
          mirrorOff: async () => {
            isMirrorOn = false;
            onModified();
          },
          mirrorOn: async () => {
            isMirrorOn = true;
            onModified();
          },
          setAvatarURL: async (url, fileData) => {
            console.log(`Avatar URL:`, url, fileData);
          },
          setAvatarData: async (fileData) => {
            console.log(`Avatar Data:`, fileData);
          },
        };
      }
      const mockGuiHandlers = createMockGuiHandlers();
      gui2d.setGuiHandlers(mockGuiHandlers);
      mockGuiHandlers.addModifiedListener(() => gui2d.updateStates());
      gui3d.setGuiHandlers(mockGuiHandlers);
      mockGuiHandlers.addModifiedListener(() => gui3d.updateStates());
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getBgmVolume()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.getbgmvolume.md) | Get the volume of BGM |
|  [getVoiceVolume()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.getvoicevolume.md) | Get the volume of voice chat |
|  [isMicOn()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.ismicon.md) | Get microphone ON/OFF |
|  [isMirrorOn()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.ismirroron.md) | Get the display state of the mirror |
|  [micOff()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.micoff.md) | Turn off the microphone |
|  [micOn()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.micon.md) | Turn on the microphone |
|  [mirrorOff()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.mirroroff.md) | Hide mirror |
|  [mirrorOn()](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.mirroron.md) | Show mirror |
|  [setAvatarData(fileData)](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.setavatardata.md) | Change avatar |
|  [setAvatarURL(url, fileData)](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.setavatarurl.md) | Change avatar |
|  [setBgmVolume(volume)](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.setbgmvolume.md) | Set the volume of BGM |
|  [setVoiceVolume(volume)](./verse-three-ui.guihandlers.setvoicevolume.md) | Set the volume of voice chat |
